item.title: Rust experiments on BBC MicroBit
item.description: I’m writing this post because I basically wanted to learn rust, and doing so through a practical example for embedded would be a nice way to do it. I’ll be basically ripping off from the book Discover, available at https://www.rust-lang.org/what/embedded (it is important to mention that I am using a MicroBit v2.00) Rust environment I started by installing rust via rustup: 1 curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh Then installing a debugger and a serial terminal cli program:
